trans-unit.source: Provides type conversion for the <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage"></xref> class.

This converter exists primarily so that the existing `xml:lang` settings in an XML file do not interfere with the parsing of attributes that use <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage> as their underlying type.
XAML Text Usage
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguageConverter"></xref> class.
Returns whether this converter can convert an object of one type to the <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage"></xref> type supported by this converter.
This method only returns `true` for `sourceType` of <xref:System.String>.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
A type that represents the type you want to convert from.
`true` if this converter can perform the conversion; otherwise, `false`.
Returns whether this converter can convert the object to the specified type.
This method returns `true` for `destinationType` of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.InstanceDescriptor> or `destinationType` of <xref:System.String>.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
The type you want to convert to.
`true` if this converter can perform the conversion; otherwise, `false`.
Converts the specified string value to the <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage"></xref> type supported by this converter.
The `source` value must be a string, otherwise an exception is thrown.
If the conversion is successful, the return value is a <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage>.
Internally, this method calls <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.GetLanguage%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
See <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.GetLanguage%2A> for additional exception information.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
The <xref href="System.Globalization.CultureInfo"></xref> to use as the current culture.
The string to convert.
An object that represents the converted value.
Conversion could not be performed.
Converts the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage"></xref> to the specified type.
For `destinationType` <xref:System.String>, this method returns the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.IetfLanguageTag%2A> value of the provided <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage>.

For `destinationType` <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.InstanceDescriptor> this method returns an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.InstanceDescriptor> instance that is useful for serialization.
Other `destinationType` inputs throw exceptions.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
The <xref href="System.Globalization.CultureInfo"></xref> to use as the current culture.
The object to convert.
This is expected to be type <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage"></xref>.
A type that represents the type you want to convert to.
An object that represents the converted value.
Conversion could not be performed.
destinationType is `null`.
